content: I'm building a React app over a FHIR sever and attempting to display stats on all attributes for a resource. For example, "Patient" would show the user pie charts of the distributions of gender, language, etc. Is there a way to query individual resources and see a comprehensive list of the SearchParameters available? I am trying to avoid hardcoding the default search parameters for a base resource (for Patient these would be things like name, address, gender), but querying /SearchParameters?base=Patient doesn't return these default params. thanks!
look in the capability statement returned from /metadata
